description:
Reduce the chance of spillage with this cool little lid.

  • MagSlider™ holds in place with the power of magnetism, which eliminates the need for grooves or rails (and makes it easy to clean)
  • Clear lid lets you see when you need a refill
  • Spill-resistant design helps reduce the risk of sloshing
  • Dishwasher safe and BPA free
name: Yeti Rambler Magslider Lid Small
